items.sentence: We hope the next 20 years will be even more successful for all of us.
Don't hesitate to tell me if there is anything you would like to eat.
I didn't know if I was coming or going the week before I got married.
I'm dying to see you tonight in any event. Please come over by seven.
If you'll keep an eye on the kids, I'll take your suit to be cleaned.
People I admire most are those who do not see life in terms of power.
Tom got angry when he was blamed for something that wasn't his fault.
If you were stuck on a deserted island, what would you miss the most?
It's not just here that this happens. This happens almost everywhere.
It isn't just here that this happens. This happens almost everywhere.
I don't know what this word means. I'll look it up in the dictionary.
I wonder if you could tell me if there is a post office in this area.
In America, rice can be bought for a fifth of what it costs in Japan.
The old men like to meet on the street corner just to shoot the bull.
You can be sure that the money you give them will be put to good use.
The burglar was traced by one of the things he had left on the scene.
I can't wait for spring to come so we can sit under the cherry trees.
I cannot go to the party, but thank you for inviting me all the same.
If it had not been for your help, I couldn't have completed the work.
Of course you can trust me. Have I ever given you a bum steer before?
